astpbBookTxt1: Call us at 819-687-9721 now! Let us know your details and those of your group so we can tailor the perfect experience for you.
astpbBookStep1: Your time of arrival (10h, 14h or other)
astpbBookOnline: Book online here. Or if you prefer...
astpbDeposit1: If you book with a deposit of 20 $ per person, we offer no freebies.
astpbDeposit2: If you book for your event by pre-paying your entire group at least 3 weeks before your date, depending on the number of participants, we add freebies. Contact us for more details.
astpbBookWaiver: Once you receive an email confirmation, we invite you to fill out our player waiver in advance. By doing so, you will save about 10 to 30 minutes  of game time during your event.
astpbMoveDate: You can move the date of the event for a 10% fee.
astpbAddPlayers: You may add players at any time by contacting us in advance.
astpbCancellationPolicy: More than 30 days before the event, 100% of your deposit can be refunded.
15 to 29 days before the event, 80% of your deposit can be refunded.
Less than 7 days before the event, your deposit cannot be refunded, but your deposit stays in the bank for 1 year. You have, 1 year after your cancellation to use your deposit for another event
membershipDjsDescription: This card only works on Sunday & Thursday from 18h until closing
After 4 years of DJS membership, you become a lifetime member
membershipYearDescription: After 2 years of yearly memberships, you become a lifetime member
